item.title: Book - Modern Nature
item.author: lvanEijnsbergen@outlook.com (Lelah van Eijnsbergen)
item.description: Recently I was reunited by a book I’ve never finished but has been on my mind many times. Modern Nature by Derek Jarman. A remarkable man’s diary about his garden house and so much more. It reminds me of beauty in everything if only I’d give it a little more attention. I wholeheartedly recommend!
